commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh*...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I made some bread rolls. I put a bunch of strawberry jam on this one, so eat up!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I put rolled eggs in my lunch today. You should try some, I know you'll like it!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I have tickets to a play. Would you like to come?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I found the absolute perfect spot to take a nap. Let's take a nap together!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: For a limited time only, this nap comes with Kanata's special fluffy body pillow!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Like, outside? The weather report said it was going to rain later.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wait, it did? We can always go to the nurse's office.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Where were you going to sleep?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks everyone, but sorry. I have some stuff to catch up on, so I have to go.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Wait...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: There she goes.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Nothing's changed today.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah... Not since the day of the tenth contest.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She looked kind of pale. Has she not been sleeping?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She doesn't have much of an appetite, either. I went to her house this morning so we could go to school, but she'd barely touched her breakfast.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wait, really? She has to eat or she'll faint.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I understand the feeling though. You realize how large the gap between you and your opponent is, and your will is crushed even before competing.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ai, do you have to be so blunt about it?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: She's right though. She didn't have the courage to even stand on the same stage as them. The result of that contest is taking a toll on her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (What was wrong with it?)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I had a lot of confidence in the quality of that song, but I just knew that had I played it that day, it wouldn't have the same lasting impression as Maki's.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (What's so different about Maki and me? No, about μ's and us? What is it they have that we don't?)

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We're always thinking of how we can shine in our own way.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Is this the shine Chika and the rest were talking about? Can μ's make such beautiful music because they found their own way to shine?)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't know. I just don't know.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Whoa, this place is crowded! Are all these people here to see the event?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: If this event is so popular, why didn't you have it in your sights, Setsuna?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I overlooked it because it wasn't a school idol only event. Sorry.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: μ's is on the list in the event pamphlet. I think they're performing in the middle of the event.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: There's something called the Healing Music Club. I bet I could sleep to that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Please don't fall asleep during the event, Kanata. If you do, we're the ones who'll have to take care of you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (There really are a lot of people here. I can't believe we didn't know about this. We need to research future events more thoroughly.)

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Keep daydreaming and you'll get left behind!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, Karin.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I know! Let's have as much fun as we can while we're here!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We'll keep a sharp eye on μ's performance, too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You're very positive, Ai.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Let's watch a bunch of performances and learn what we can from them!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good idea. I'll be watching closely, for our future.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Guys, the event is about to start!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: This is so fun! Listening to all this different music is amazing!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: The singing, the performance, they're all so good. Incredible.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That high school band before was pretty good, don't you think?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? O-Oh, yeah...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (μ's is finally up next. It could have been us up there.)

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hello everyone! We're μ's!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: μ's!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We're very happy to be up here on this stage today!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We would like to thank all of you for coming by singing our hearts out!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: May our shining thoughts reach hearts and ears everywhere!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whew, μ's was amazing!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That was way above my expectations. My heart was so in tune with them!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Their expressions, movements, it all had so much life. Just watching them made me want to jump around.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Shouldn't expect anything less from a top tier school idol group.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The whole venue was about them as soon as their song started.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It was exactly the same. Exactly the same as I had imagined when Maki played that song.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It was truly a song made specifically for μ's. Not for anyone else. Just a pure song made to make its singers shine.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The right song for the singers and the right singers for the song. When you have both of those, it has to be perfect.)

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: To think we competed against a group like them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, μ's is really something. I love them. They make me want to listen to them forever.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (But I wanted to win. I wanted to win and see everyone from Nijigasaki up on stage!)
